entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 then light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
